character.noteList: Goliath Features: • Athletics proficiency • As a reaction, you can reduce damage you would take by 1d12 + Con (1/rest) • You can lift, drag, push, and carry weight as if one size larger • You are adapted to cold climates and high altitudes (see rules) Soldier Feature: • You have influence within your former army/organization Class Features: • Gain advantage on survival and Int checks concerning your chosen creature type, and you know a language spoken by those creatures • Gain advantage on Wis and Int checks concerning your chosen terrain, and bonuses while traveling through that terrain (see rules) • Fighting Style - Two-Weapon Fighting: Add ability modifier to off-hand damage • You can sacrifice a spell slot as an action to determine if certain creature types are within 1 mile (6 miles if favored terrain) (see rules) • Ranger Archetype: Beast Master • Gain a beast companion (see rules) • Great Weapon Master: You can make a bonus action attack after critting or killing a creature and you can take -5 to a melee attack for +10 damage • You can make two attacks on your turn ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Simple Weapons, Martial Weapons ⊠One type of gaming set Vehicles (land) ⊠Common Giant Language spoken by favored enemy (if any) ⊠two shortswords OR two simple melee weapons longbow + 20 arrows dungeoneer's pack OR explorer's pack rank insignia trophy set of bone dice OR deck of cards set of common clothes belt pouch scale mail ⊠⊠Ranger 5⊠Goliath⊠Soldier⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Lark⊠Ranger 5⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠10⊠0⊠0
